links.*: The Book of Lost Tales Part One

wikitext.*:
'''''tirin''''' is both a [[Qenya]] and [[Gnomish]] noun applied to towers.<ref name=Kortirion>{{LT1|Appendix}}, entry "[[Kortirion]]"</ref>

==Qenya==
''tirin'' (stem ''tirind-'') in Qenya means "tall tower, turret, minaret".<ref>{{PE|12}}, p. 93</ref>

===Examples===
* ''[[Estirin|Es'''tirin''']]'' = "Outer Tower"
* ''[[Ingil's Tirin|Ingil's '''Tirin''']]'' = "Tower of Ingil"

==Gnomish==
''tirin'' in Gnomish means "watch-tower, turret, tower".<ref>{{PE|11}}, p. 71</ref> The Qenya cognate was ''[[tirion]]''.<ref name=Kortirion/>

===Examples===
* ''[[Tirimbrithla|'''Tirim'''brithla]]'' = "Tower of Pearl"
* ''[[Tirin na Gilweth|'''Tirin''' na Gilweth]]'' = "Tower of Gilweth"
